text: Marian Awad (, ; born 29 October 1996) is an Arab-Israeli footballer who plays as a midfielder and has appeared for the Israel women's national team. ==Career== Awad has been capped for the Israel national team, appearing for the team during the 2019 FIFA Women's World Cup qualifying cycle. ==References== ==External links== * * * Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:Israeli women's footballers Category:Israel women's international footballers Category:Women's association football midfielders Category:Arab citizens of Israel Category:Arab-Israeli footballers
title: Marian Awad
